title: Dancing on Broken Glass
description: You are now invited inside the once dark world of Bobby Fish.. teen gang leader, twenty-five year heroin and cocaine addict, survivor and hero of the mean streets of NYC's Spanish Harlem. Changing ones life is truly possible, but only if one becomes as committed to staying clean and sober, as he once was to chasing after drugs out there on the mean streets of despair.
author: R.F. Maldonado
